Question: In that month, this person discussed a draft of the Emancipation Proclamation with his cabinet.
Hints: This person and the Republican Party mobilized support for the draft throughout the North, and replaced his losses.
This person also supported the Wilmot Proviso, which, if it had been adopted, would have banned slavery in any U.S.
"Willie" this person was born on December 21, 1850, and died on February 20, 1862.
